013package org.apache.juneau.internal;
014
015import static org.apache.juneau.internal.SystemEnv.*;
016import java.util.concurrent.*;
017import java.util.concurrent.atomic.*;
018import java.util.function.*;
019
020/**
021 * Simple in-memory cache of objects.
022 *
023 * <p>
024 * Essentially just a wrapper around a ConcurrentHashMap.
025 *
026 * <ul class='seealso'>
027 * </ul>
028 *
029 * @param <K> The key type.
030 * @param <V> The value type.
031 */
032public class Cache<K,V> {
033
034   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
035   // Static
036   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
037
038   /**
039    * Static creator.
040    *
041    * @param <K> The key type.
042    * @param <V> The value type.
043    * @param key The key type.
044    * @param type The value type.
045    * @return A new builder for this object.
046    */
047   public static <K,V> Builder<K,V> of(Class<K> key, Class<V> type) {
048      return new Builder<>(type);
049   }
050
051   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
052   // Builder
053   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
054
055   /**
056    * Builder class.
057    *
058    * @param <K> The key type.
059    * @param <V> The value type.
060    */
061   public static class Builder<K,V> {
062      boolean disabled, logOnExit;
063      int maxSize;
064      Class<V> type;
065
066      Builder(Class<V> type) {
067         this.type = type;
068         disabled = env("juneau.cache.disable", false);
069         maxSize = env("juneau.cache.maxSize", 1000);
070         logOnExit = env("juneau.cache.logOnExit", false);
071      }
072
073      /**
074       * Disables this cache.
075       *
076       * @return This object.
077       */
078      public Builder<K,V> disabled() {
079         disabled = true;
080         return this;
081      }
082
083      /**
084       * When enabled, logs cache hit statistics on this cache.
085       *
086       * @return This object.
087       */
088      public Builder<K,V> logOnExit() {
089         logOnExit = true;
090         return this;
091      }
092
093      /**
094       * Specifies the maximum size of this cache.
095       *
096       * @param value The value for this setting.
097       * @return This object.
098       */
099      public Builder<K,V> maxSize(int value) {
100         maxSize = value;
101         return this;
102      }
103
104      /**
105       * Builds this object.
106       *
107       * @return A new cache.
108       */
109      public Cache<K,V> build() {
110         return new Cache<>(this);
111      }
112   }
113
114   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
115   // Instance
116   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
117
118   private final int maxSize;
119   private final ConcurrentHashMap<K,V> cache;
120   private final AtomicInteger cacheHits = new AtomicInteger();
121
122   /**
123    * Constructor
124    *
125    * @param builder The builder for this object.
126    */
127   protected Cache(Builder<K,V> builder) {
128      cache = builder.disabled ? null : new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
129      maxSize = builder.maxSize;
130      if (builder.logOnExit) {
131         SystemUtils.shutdownMessage(()->builder.type.getSimpleName() + " cache:  hits=" + cacheHits.get() + ", misses: " + cache.size());
132      }
133   }
134   /**
135    * Retrieves the value with the specified key from this cache.
136    *
137    * @param key The key.
138    * @param supplier The supplier for creating this object if it's not found in the cache.
139    * @return The value.
140    */
141   public V get(K key, Supplier<V> supplier) {
142      if (cache == null || key == null)
143         return supplier.get();
144      V v = cache.get(key);
145      if (v == null) {
146         if (cache.size() > maxSize)
147            cache.clear();
148         v = supplier.get();
149         cache.putIfAbsent(key, v);
150      } else {
151         cacheHits.incrementAndGet();
152      }
153      return v;
154   }
155}
